Breda N ( 1992) Photosynthesis of oak trees [Quercus petraea (Matt) Liebl] during drought under field conditions - diurnal course of net CO2 assimilation and photochemical efficiency of photosystem-II. Plant Cell Environ 15: 809- 820. doi: 10.1111/j.1365-3040.1992.tb02148.x.
